org.jetel.util

Class XmlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.XmlUtils

  • public class XmlUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Set of utilities for manipulating with XML documents.

    • Method Summary

      • isValidElementName

        public static boolean isValidElementName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns true if the argument can be used as a name of an XML element (or attribute). Uses Apache XMLBeans library.
        Parameters:
        name - the string to be checked
        Returns:
        true if name is a valid XML element or attribute name

      • createQualifiedName

        public static java.lang.String createQualifiedName(java.lang.String prefixedName,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> namespaceBindings)
        Expands a prefixed element or attribute name to a universal name. I.e. the namespace prefix is replaced by augmented URI. The URIs are taken from the namespaceBindings parameter.
        Parameters:
        prefixedName - XML element or attribute name e.g. mov:movies
        Returns:
        Universal XML name in the form: {http://www.javlin.eu/movies}title

      • createDocumentFromProperties

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document createDocumentFromProperties(java.lang.String rootElement,
                                                java.util.Properties properties)
        Creates org.w3c.dom.Document with single root element, which has attributes assembled from the given properties. Example result:
        Parameters:
        rootElement - name of root element
        properties - properties which will be converted to attributes of the only root element
        Returns:
        XML document with described structure
